name: d3-geo-voronoi
description: Spherical Voronoi Diagram and Delaunay Triangulation

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -g d3-array:d3,d3-geo:d3,d3-delaunay:d3 -f umd -n d3 --extend d3 -o build/d3-geo-voronoi.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-geo-voronoi.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o build/d3-geo-voronoi.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-geo-voronoi.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-geo-voronoi.js build/d3-geo-voronoi.min.js
